useCase.name: Manage Storage Expansion

preconditions.precondition: Archive Manager requests data volume information from DMPTool.

successEndConditions.condition: Archive Manager receives comprehensive storage needs analysis from DMPTool.

useCase.trigger: Archive Manager initiates storage expansion planning.

mainSequence.step: Archive Manager requests data volume information from DMPTool.
DMPTool queries planned data submissions from Repository API.
Repository API returns data submission estimates to DMPTool.
DMPTool requests current storage capacity details from IT System.
IT System returns current storage capacity details to DMPTool.
DMPTool requests additional data preservation details from Data Manager.
Data Manager provides data format, size, and preservation period details to DMPTool.
DMPTool shows comprehensive storage needs analysis to Archive Manager.
Archive Manager plans for storage expansion with IT System.
IT System confirms storage infrastructure plan to Archive Manager.
Archive Manager confirms storage planning completion to DMPTool.
